mapper.sql: id, name,name_alias, ads_id, price, activity_start, activity_end, activity_price, target_link, is_support_param, status, image_url, download_url, daily_limit, description, c1_key, c2_key, type_key, c3_key, create_date, modify_date, callback_status,voluum_offer_id
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.name,name_alias, a.ads_id, a.price, a.activity_start, a.activity_end, a.activity_price, a.target_link, a.type_key, a.c3_key, a.is_support_param, a.status, a.image_url, a.download_url, a.daily_limit, a.description, a.create_date,a.c1_key, a.c2_key, a.modify_date,GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(c.country)) mccGroup, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(d.operator)) mncGroup,b.name adsName, a.callback_status,a.voluum_offer_id FROM t_config_resources a LEFT JOIN t_base_advertisers b ON a.`ads_id` = b.`id` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.id,a.pid,b.country FROM t_config_resources_mcc a, t_base_mcc b WHERE a.mcc_id = b.id ) c ON a.`id` = c.pid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.id,a.pid,b.`operator` FROM t_config_resources_mnc a, t_base_mnc b WHERE a.mnc_id = b.id ) d ON c.id = d.pid where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into t_config_resources (id, name,name_alias, ads_id, price, activity_start, activity_end, activity_price, target_link, is_support_param, status, image_url, download_url, daily_limit, description, c1_key, c2_key, type_key, c3_key, create_date, modify_date, callback_status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{nameAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, #{activityStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{activityEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{activityPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{targetLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSupportParam,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downloadUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dailyLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c1Key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{c2Key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{c3Key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{callbackStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id,
name,
name_alias,
ads_id,

voluum_offer_id,

nameAlias,
#{adsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update t_config_resources
name_alias = #{nameAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_start = #{activityStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
activity_end = #{activityEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
daily_limit = #{dailyLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
callback_status = #{callbackStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_config_resources set name_alias = #{nameAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, activity_start = #{activityStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, activity_end = #{activityEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, activity_price = #{activityPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, daily_limit = #{dailyLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, callback_status = #{callbackStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: delete a from t_config_resources a, t_config_resources_mcc b where a.id = b.pid and b.mcc_id = #{mccId}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.name,name_alias, a.ads_id, a.price, a.activity_start, a.activity_end, a.activity_price, a.target_link, a.type_key, a.c3_key, a.is_support_param, a.status, a.image_url, a.download_url, a.daily_limit, a.description, a.create_date,a.c1_key, a.c2_key, a.modify_date,group_concat(distinct(c.country)) mccGroup, group_concat(distinct(d.operator)) mncGroup,b.name adsName, a.callback_status,a.voluum_offer_id from t_config_resources a left join t_base_advertisers b on a.`ads_id` = b.`id` left join ( select a.id,a.pid,b.country from t_config_resources_mcc a, t_base_mcc b where a.mcc_id = b.id ) c on a.`id` = c.pid left join ( select a.id,a.pid,b.`operator` from t_config_resources_mnc a, t_base_mnc b where a.mnc_id = b.id ) d on c.id = d.pid where 1 = 1 group by a.id order by a.modify_date desc
